subject: Re: Poe Meets Shaw is now on sale! :-)
msgSnippet: ... Well, that s a start, at least. It could be a screen size/resolution thing. I m sorry if I ve come across as overly harsh. I m guessing that my
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Sid Tanaban wrote:
>
> I have a MacBook Pro

Well, that's a start, at least. It could be a screen size/resolution thing. I'm sorry if I've come across as overly harsh. I'm guessing that my frustrations with everything that's been going on with this unintentionally came out that way over e-mail. I really would like to get this fixed somehow. Let's take this private instead so that the board can get back to its intended purpose.
